links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=1,150,v=concat(v,floor(1/sin(Pi/(n+1))))); v(PARI) { default(realprecision, 50); for (n=1, 1000, write("b062300.txt", n, " ", floor(1/sin(Pi/(n+1)))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 19 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 22 2001
